This is a whizzier version of #19405 inspired by laanwj's Python script mentioned in that PR, which it turns out I ended up using every day and extending. Can add a release note and tests if review feedback is positive.
```
$ bitcoin-cli --help | grep -A3 netinfo
  -netinfo
       Get network peer connection information from the remote server. An
       optional boolean argument can be passed for a detailed peers
       listing (default: false).
```
